long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block Blast! Online Free Games: An exciting online free game where you place blocks to achieve line or column elimination!

Welcome to Block Blast! Online Free Games! This is an exhilarating online free game where you place blocks to achieve line or column elimination and earn high scores!

Key Features:

Block placement and elimination: In Block Blast! Online Free Games, you need to place blocks of different shapes within the game area. When a row or a column is filled with blocks, that row or column will be eliminated, earning you points. By strategically placing blocks and eliminating more rows or columns, you can achieve higher scores!

Multiple game modes: The game offers various game modes, including classic mode, challenge mode, and more. Each mode has unique rules and objectives, allowing you to fully enjoy the fun of block elimination. Choose your favorite mode, challenge yourself, and beat your high scores!

Diverse block shapes: There are a variety of block shapes to choose from, including squares, rectangles, L-shapes, and more. Select the appropriate block shape based on the game's needs to optimize your elimination strategy.

Extension Button Menu
*Play more games and explore exciting themes on the page menu buttons.
